What is the origin of Verus, and what technologies does it leverage?

Verus is a fork of Zcash and Komodo, and it leverages the Komodo platform. It also appreciates the contributions and support from the Bitcoin developers, as it builds upon their foundation. Verus supports Bitcoin and Zcash compatible transaction types, as well as Komodo cross-chain swaps and dPoW security enhancements.
